title: 72A.02 VIOLATIONS AS TO POLICIES OF INSURANCE.
text: Every company, and every officer and agent of any company, making, issuing, delivering, or tendering any policy of insurance of any kind, or directing any of the same to be done, in willful violation of any of the provisions of law, for a first offense, shall be guilty of a misdemeanor, and for each subsequent offense, of a gross misdemeanor; and, in addition to all other penalties prescribed by law, every company issuing any such policy shall be disqualified from doing any insurance business in this state until the payment of all fines imposed and for one year thereafter.
